uwcse.tools
Class EasyJava

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Window
                    |
                    +--java.awt.Frame
                          |
                          +--uwcse.tools.EasyJava
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class EasyJava
extends java.awt.Frame

Prototype of a VERY simple instructional Java development environment. The environment has 3 panes: one editor for a source file, a message pane for compiler errors/warnings, and a shell pane for interacting with an interpreter. The environment requires (1) jikes (because of the ease of parsing its error/warning messages) (2) bsh (the BeanShell). It could be modified to use javac and jeva (or another interpreter), but I haven't done so, yet.

Version:
$Id: EasyJava.java,v 1.2 2001/10/20 00:31:38 chambers Exp $
Author:
Ben Dugan
See Also:
